title: Reiter In
text:
Reiter In is the thirteenth album by singer-songwriter and guitarist, <a href="Chris%20Whitley">Chris Whitley</a>. It is his eleventh studio album and the last he made before his death (five months later, at 45) in November 2005.
The album was recorded as a band effort and is billed as "Chris Whitley & The Bastard Club".
Kenny Siegal (of <a href="Johnny%20Society">Johnny Society</a>) produced, co-wrote, and played on the album. It was recorded all <a href="Analog%20recording">analog</a> and live on a <a href="Magnetic%20tape%20sound%20recording">two-inch tape</a> <a href="Sony">Sony</a> <a href="MCI%20%28audio%29">MCI</a> JH24 tape deck through a Trident <a href="Mixing%20console">board</a> at Old Soul Studios in <a href="Catskill%20%28town%29%2C%20New%20York">Catskill</a>, New York. It was mixed by John Holbrook.
Track listing.
All tracks written by Chris Whitley unless otherwise noted.
